biotools.summary: ScType is a tool for fully-automated cell type identification from single-cell RNA-seq data. ScType provides a complete pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis (including data processing, normalization and clustering) and cell-type annotation.

bioschemas.name: ScType
bioschemas.summary: ScType is a tool for fully-automated cell type identification from single-cell RNA-seq data. ScType provides a complete pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis (including data processing, normalization and clustering) and cell-type annotation.
